effect.short: For three turns, friendly Pokémon have doubled Speed.
effect.full: For the next three turns, all Pokémon on the user's side of the field have their original Speed doubled.  This effect remains if the user leaves the field.

flavorTexts.text:
The user whips up a turbulent whirlwind that ups
the Speed stat of the user and its allies for
four turns.
